Package breakout.core.audio

Class AudioSystem

java.lang.Object
breakout.core.audio.AudioSystem
All Implemented Interfaces:
DefaultDependenciesInjectable
public class AudioSystem extends Object implements DefaultDependenciesInjectable
Manages and handles all audio medias and players.
